thread.section_title: Dickmanns Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Dickmanns Rent a Car | dickmannsrentacar.com
thread.title: David Walsh
thread.title_full: Dickmanns Rent a Car evaluado por David Walsh

author: David Walsh
title: David Walsh
text:
Be very aware of this company. Wish I had read reviews about this company before i handed them my credit card.
Returned car mid Nov. and after 3 e-mails from customer service still no refund. Just filled out complaint form for the bank to deal with it.
NEVER NEVER AGAIN
